title: 이춘화
content:
이춘화
는 서울
공과대학
컴퓨터소프트웨어학부
교수이자 컴퓨터소프트웨어학부장이다.
위치:
ITBT관
721호
연락처: 02-2220-1268 / lee@hanyang.ac.kr
연구실:
분산 및 클라우드 컴퓨팅 연구실
학력
Ph.D. in Computer Engineering, University of Florida, U.S.A
M.S. in Computer Engineering, Seoul National University, South Korea
B.S. in Computer Engineering, Seoul National University, South Korea
경력
Professor, Division of Computer Science & Eng, Hanyang University, 2004 - Present
Past Doctoral Research Associate, CISE Department, University of Florida, 2003 - 2004
Research Assistant, CISE Department, University of Florida, 1999 - 2003
Senior Research Engineer, LGIC Ltd., 1992 - 1998
